Test Name: JC Polyoma Virus DNA, Quantitative Real-Time PCR (Plasma)
Purpose: To detect and quantify JC Polyoma Virus DNA for diagnosis and monitoring of patients, especially those who are immunocompromised.
Container: Plasma collection tube (e.g., EDTA or heparin tube)
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., Bio-Rad CFX96 or Applied Biosystems 7500), refrigerated centrifuge, vortex mixer, pipettes
